name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix, Prime, JioCinema, Hotstar - Auto intro skipper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix, Prime, JioCinema, Hotstar Skip Intros Automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Netflix, Prime, JioCinema, Hotstar - Auto intro skipper

If you want me to enable it for any other platform, please email me or create an issue on GitHub.


IMPORTANT: you need to refresh the Netflix and Prime video page only once after installing the extension. Switch to English language if it still doesn’t work for you.

UPDATE: It best works in English as a language, so please switch to English if it doesn't work for you.









======================== Changelog ============================
v4.0.1 (Added JioCinema and Hotstar)
Enabled Ads skip for Prime


v4.0.0 (Added JioCinema and Hotstar)
Exclusively for Skips for Popular OTT platforms. 
Manifest Update to V3
Removed skips for next episode, recap, etc

v3.4.1 (German and Italian translation)
Also some dependency updates

v3.4.0 (Critical bug fix and Turkish translation)
Resumed working for languages other than english as well.
Turkish translation from contributor.

v3.3.5 (Spanish and Dutch translation)
Updated contributors list and merged's contributor's Spanish and Dutch skip intro translation change.

v3.3.4 (German translation)
Updated contributors list and merged's contributor's German skip intro translation change.

v3.3.3 (Performance improvements)
Skipping is faster and doesn't depend on the API call.
500ms for Prime and 250ms for Netflix.

v3.3.2 (Spanish translation)
Updated contributors list and merged's contributor's Spanish skip intro translation change.

v3.3.1 (French translation)
Updated contributors list and merged's contributor's French skip intro translation change.

v3.3.0 (breaking change)
Primevideo changed from div to button tag, please update to continue using.

v3.2.3
Reduce sleep time for skipping text (Now extension skips faster)

v3.2.2
Added correct IT(Italian) translation from the contributor.

v3.2.1
Added FR and JP translation from the contributors.

v3.2.0
Added more languages for Skip Ads.

v3.1.1
Fixed: for some users it was stuck at Skipping...

v3.1.0
Now it supports all 22 languages on prime, except skip Ads, which is only works for a few languages.

To enable skip Ads in your language please add it:

https://github.com/naman03malhotra/auto-skip-for-netflix-and-prime/blob/master/src/utils/i18n.js


V2.3.0:  Set your primevideo default language to English. 
Your prime video should be in English language inorder for this to work.
For example if you are in Germany and `Skip Intro` translates to `Intro überspringen`, it won't work. It has to be `Skip Intro`. This is due to the recent change prime did in their UI. Please change it accordingly.

V2.2.1:
Now it supports the latest primevideo UI.
"Continue watching Netflix" auto skip for binge watchers.
Total extension size is now around 11 KB only, smallest in the market place.

V1.1.0:
It is very tedious to skip those long intro sequences and recaps on Netflix and Amazon Prime, you have to press the skip button each time.

And those Ads on Amazon prime are so annoying, right? No worries, we have got you covered.

We have a solution for our super lazy user. Now you can:

    Auto Skips intros and recaps on both Netflix and Prime
    Auto Skips credits and play next episode on Prime
    Auto Skips Ads on Prime
    Auto Skips Continue Watching on Netflix

NOTE: you need to refresh the Netflix and Prime video page once after installing the extension.

Source Code: http://bit.ly/aspn_code
Product Hunt: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/auto-skip-intro-for-netflix-and-prime
